column4: heh, apt-get remove kde* does a decent job of killing kubuntu-desktop package (i.e. removing it)
thought apt-get --purge remove kubuntu-desktop would just work....
kubuntu-desktop is a meta-pacakge... doesn't remove all the ones it installs
ah ... ok. I did not try it but I might be wrong. I rememeber I installed kubuntu by just using that meta pkg
